message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is a high-quality item that I believe you'll find very valuable based on your needs.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you being willing to work with me.  $120 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, considering its value to me.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposal for the product price is $100. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
